column5: Keep an eye out for this, here's a link to their facebook page that has pictures:  https://www.facebook.com/ElmhirstResort/
They charge so much for boat rentals the person probably just thought they purchased it.
They charge so much for boat rentals the person probably just thought they purchased it. I know a stolen boat is no laughing matter, it could easily happen to any one of us..But this made me LOL
That was pretty funny, even though it really isnt a laughing matter

I heard of one last night on FB. The guys boat came off the trailer, and he didn't notice. Someone flagged him down that saw it happen, and by the time the guy got turned around and back to where it happened his boat was GONE! This was on hwy 12 near the port perry cop shop.  Crazy...  S.
Okay I have to ask....how does one not notice when ones boat comes of the trailer.....

I heard of one last night on FB. The guys boat came off the trailer, and he didn't notice. Someone flagged him down that saw it happen, and by the time the guy got turned around and back to where it happened his boat was GONE! This was on hwy 12 near the port perry cop shop.  Crazy...  S. Yeah I had seen that post too!  It's probably sitting at the cop shop so he can be fined for an unsafe load (or something to that affect)  Okay I have to ask....how does one not notice when ones boat comes of the trailer..... I know.  I thought the same thing when I read the post and seen the ad on kijiji
